quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Mtv and Videos
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, cartoon. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: When lyrics correspond to the story acted out in a music video, their impact is stronger.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: A 2001 study found that 25 % of the videos include sexual imagery. Furthermore, 60% combine sexual imagery with violence against women.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: These were the first videos shown on MTV and constituted the bulk of the networks programming in the 80s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Promotional or concert clips

questions.question: In the beginning of the century this number of households had access to MTV.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 350 million

questions.question: On the sitcom The Brady Bunch, the kids need money to buy a present for their parents anniversary, so they decide to perform on a TV show under what name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Silver Platters

questions.question: During its second season, TV show Home Improvement was renewed for three additional seasons, an uncommon decision in the TV industry.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the beginning MTV was reckoned as racist, because most of the aired videos were of white artists. In October of 1982, this was the first black artist video to be shown on MTV.

options.text: Never Grow Old by Aretha Franklin
Every Day is a New Day by Diana Ross
Postcard from Philly by The Jacksons
The Message by Grandmaster Flash  the Furious Five

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Message by Grandmaster Flash  the Furious Five

questions.question: This cartoon show aired on MTV from 1993 to 1997, and is stated to be highly influential upon 1990s youth language in America.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beavis and Butt-head

questions.question: On sitcom, Home Improvement, what is Tim Taylors favorite hobby?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hot Rods

questions.question: After MTVs programming changed to include more heavy metal and rap music, MTV Networks launched a second network, called this.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: VH1

questions.question: In the Hawaiian episodes of The Brady Bunch, the character portrayed by Vincent Price keeps talking to an idol statue, which he calls by what name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Oliver

questions.question: What actor played the main character on Home Improvement, Tim The Tool Man Taylor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tim Allen

questions.question: In Never Too Young, an episode of The Brady Bunch, Bobby kisses Millicent, a character portrayed by which actress?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Melissa Sue Anderson

questions.question: In season one of the The Brady Bunch, Carol and Mike discovered that Greg had a crush on someone named Linda. Who is the mysterious Linda?

options.text: The hair-netted lunch lady in the cafeteria

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gregs math teacher

questions.question: This term was coined by MTV.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: VJ

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Bell and Charmed
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, tv. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: On TV show, Saved by the Bell there was an episode in which Screech Powers married Lisa Turtle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: This was the year when the first  MTV Video Music Awards show was produced to celebrate the top music videos of the year.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1984

questions.question: What is the name of the enchanted book in the series Charmed which contains spells, potions, and information on enemies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Book of Shadows

questions.question: Did the students on Saved by the Bell once have a teacher named Miss Bliss?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Actor Dustin Diamond does not return for Saved by the Bell: The New Class.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: All of these except one are last names used on TV show Saved by the Bell.  Can you spot the odd one?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Turtles

questions.question: What is the name of the girls whitelighter whom Piper marries in Season 3 of the TV show Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leo Wyatt

questions.question: In which US city is the Charmed TV series set?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: San Francisco

questions.question: On TV show Saved by the Bell, Zack married Lisa Turtle.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Which of the sisters in Charmed first has the power of premonitions and later develops the powers of levitation and empathy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Phoebe

questions.question: Was Tori Spelling a cast memeber on Saved by The Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: What was the name of the high school the gang of Saved by the Bell attended?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bayside

questions.question: How many sisters were there in the first three seasons of the series Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: This was one of the earliest representations of MTV. Later, the statuette given to the winners of the MTV Video Music Awards represented the same object.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: An astronaut on the moon

questions.question: Mark-Paul Gosselaar played which character on Saved By The Bell?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zack Morris

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Series and Charmed
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, gilbert. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: TV actor and director Hugh Beaumont, who played Ward Cleaver in the Leave It to Beaver sitcom, was born February 16, 1909 in Lawrence, Kansas.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What was the name of Beavers chubby friend in the Leave it to Beaver series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Larry

questions.question: What is the name of the girls grandmother in the series Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Penny

questions.question: In the series Charmed, Paige is the daughter of Patty Halliwell and her whitelighter Sam.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What year did Leave it to Beaver air for the first time in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1957

questions.question: In the series Charmed, in her teenage years Paige wrote a moving essay about her parents death.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Gilbert Bates, a friend of Beavers on Leave it to Beaver, was played by which actor?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Stephen Talbot

questions.question: Is it true that on the TV show Charmed, Cole impregnated Phoebe with his demon baby and she became Queen of the Underworld.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: June Cleaver, Beavers mother, was played by which of these actresses in the sitcom Leave It to Beaver?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barbara Billingsley

questions.question: What was the nickname of Wallys friend Clarence Rutherford on Leave it to Beaver?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lumpy

questions.question: Cole Turner, Belthazors human part, had what job in the series Charmed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: District Attorney

questions.question: In the Leave it to Beaver show, June and Ward Cleaver adopted a young boy to fill the void of Wally (Beavers older brother) getting older.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Ken Osmond played which of the following characters from the Leave It to Beaver series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eddie

questions.question: Who is the demon in the series Charmed who appears on Earth once every thirteen hundred years and whom the Charmed Ones were unable to vanquish until Season 7?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Demon of Fear

questions.question: What was little Beavers first name on the Leave it to Beaver show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Theodore

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Actor and Series
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, mightve. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In this western series Gail Davis portrayd a famous sharpshooter from the past.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie Oakley

questions.question: Name the western series in which actor Dan Blocker played until his untimely death.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bonanza

questions.question: Picture it. The sun, the sea, hundreds of women just like her running around, and me, the first man theyve seen in... oh, maybe forever? Oh, and look what I brought. Ice Mochas for everyone. Sweet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Justice League

questions.question: In which American western series did actor Milburn Stone star for 20 seasons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gunsmoke

questions.question: Chuck Connors and Johnny Crawford starred together in which classic western TV-series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Rifleman

questions.question: In which western, directed by Sidney Salkow, did actor William Bendix play the role of Fred Kelly?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Overland Trail

questions.question: Buck Taylor played Newly OBrien in which western series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gunsmoke

questions.question: Who played Gus the Fireman on the Leave it to Beaver show for 14 episodes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Burt Mustin

questions.question: In which western did Lee Majors star before going on to play in The Six Million Dollar Man?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Big Valley

questions.question: Yabba Dabba Do.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Flinstones

questions.question: Actor Peter Graves played Christopher Cobb in which short-lived western series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Whiplash

questions.question: If you didnt wake me up, I mightve had a nightmare and it wouldve woke me up. Then, I couldve woke you up and we would both be awake. But since you did wake me up, I cant wake up from this nightmare so i cant wake you up! So were both still asleep.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2 Stupid Dogs

questions.question: William Boyd starred alongside Edgar Buchanan in which great TV show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hopalong Cassidy

questions.question: You better save some room, Delightful Dorks, cause youre gonna eat your words along with that cake!

options.text: The Grim Adventures of Billy And Mandy (Grim and Evil)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Codename: Kids Next Door

questions.question: Name the 1994 western movie in which James Garner played a gambling man.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maverick

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Kirk and Captain Kirk
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, kirk, trek. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Adam mentioned that he and Replikon used to work here a long time ago. Now to get you out of here. Ooh!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Static Shock

questions.question: The character of Captain Kirk was once played by a woman in an episode of Star Trek.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: During the classic TV series Star Trek, Captain Kirk commanded a starship with how many crewmembers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 430

questions.question: Ooga-booga!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Courage the Cowardly Dog

questions.question: Upon graduation from Starfleet Academy, Captain Kirk from the Star Trek series was assigned to the USS Endeavor.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What state is Captain Kirk originally from according to the Star Trek series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Iowa

questions.question: In the film Star Trek: Generations, Captain Kirk died. What was the name of the planet on which Kirk lost his life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Veridian III

questions.question: Captain Kirk from Star Trek never attained a rank higher than Captain in spite of his heroic service.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the Star Trek series, what was the first name of Captain Kirks only son?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David

questions.question: Bloo, youd better stay away from that secret door. Youre going to get in trouble.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Fosters Home for Imaginary Friends

questions.question: Will you please refrain from touching me while I am eating? Thank you.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed, Edd n Eddy

questions.question: Its not fair! Im just as tough and strong and mean as Buttercup and Blossom, but they just dont believe me. They all treat me like a baby. Ill show them. Ill prove that I can be... hard-core!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Powerpuff Girls

questions.question: What was the name of the woman with whom Captain Kirk had a 2-year relationship in the Star Trek series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anatonia

questions.question: This American sitcom, which ran from 1996 until 2001, involved a group of alien explorers, who came to Earth to study human behaviour.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3rd Rock from the Sun

questions.question: Sometimes nature is too natural for its own good.

options.text: The Grim Adventures of Billy and Mandy (Grim and Evil)

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cramp Twins

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Sitcom and Episode
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, harris, blakes. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What midwest city was the hometown of fictional character Colonel Blake?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bloomington, Illinois

questions.question: The cast of M*A*S*H actually had no idea that Colonel Blake was going to be killed off until the filming of the episode in which this happened.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these sitcoms revolves around the Bluths - a wealthy family on its way down?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Arrested Development

questions.question: This American animated sitcom is brought to the screen by Seth MacFarlane, the creator of another animated hit - Family Guy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: American Dad!

questions.question: In the episode of the M*A*S*H series, titled As Time Goes By the members of the 4077 created a time capsule. Which of Colonel Blakes items was added to this time capsule?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A fishing fly

questions.question: Which of these is the name of one of Colonel Blakes daughters in the series M*A*S*H?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Molly

questions.question: Which of these American actresses is the creator and star of the sitcom 30 Rock?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tina Fey

questions.question: David Crane and Marta Kauffman, the creators of Dream On are also famous for creating one of the most popular sitcoms ever. What is the name of the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Friends

questions.question: Neil Patrick Harris, who stars in the sitcom How I Met Your Mother, became famous as a child-actor in which show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doogie Howser, M.D.

questions.question: Hawkeye from the M*A*S*H series once wrote in a letter to his father that Colonel Blakes command style was like having which fictional character in command of the RMS Titanic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daffy Duck

questions.question: How many seasons of  M*A*S*H did the character Colonel Blake appear in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: Will Smith is the star of which of these American sitcoms?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air

questions.question: The main characters of this American animated sitcom are Cartman, Stan, Kyle and Kenny.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: South Park

questions.question: This famous sitcom originally ran on NBC from 1986 to 1990, and featured a wacky alien, who crashes on earth and stays with an American family.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ALF

questions.question: This American sitcom, starring Ray Romano, revolves around a sports journalist, who lives across the street from his parents.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Everybody Loves Raymond
